recover-password-desc: Enter your email address that you used to register. We'll send you an email with a link to reset your password

onboard-more-info: To help secure your account, and possibly give you special offers, we would love to have a bit more information.

add-account.title: Create a new account
add-account.subtitle: Choose the account type below you want to create
add-account.desc: It looks like you want to add new account. A new Account is a way to access different functionality on LiveRight
add-account.client-desc: Prepare your nutrition with the support of LiveRight. Get a trainer and follow your progess.
add-account.trainer-desc: Train others and manage your business with the LiveRight platform. Track clients and their progress.
add-account.org-desc: Manage your entire fitness organization on a single place. Add users to support with admin tasks, trainer and clients.
